name: face pairs
description:
click duplicated faces to remove them from the screen and hear a boop sound.
clear them all and you'll get a little victory animation before the screen fills back up with more faces.

this was not really meant for a game but i made it playable so it is now!
from genuary propmt "draw 10 thousand of something" came a smiley generator that used circle packing to fit 10 thousand on screen.
since the number of possible faces was under 10k it was possible to find repeats. in order to make it playable faces now come in pairs so there is always a match.
